parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240003) at the end. This strongly suggests an intention to engage in electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are typically used by candidates or their representatives to comply with legal requirements for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name, it heavily implies a preference against the PSD-PNL-USR alliance.  It uses numerical data to suggest that this alliance has a significant advantage and that other candidates (implicitly including the author) are at a disadvantage. This indirectly refers to all candidates within the mentioned alliance, and thus, it can be considered as referring to candidates.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook post, clearly intended for a wide audience. The language used ("români," "voi," "fiecare dintre voi") and the call to action ("ieșiți la vot") all indicate an attempt to reach a broad segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to influence voters' choices in the upcoming parliamentary elections.  The post presents a stark comparison between the voting power of the PSD-PNL-USR alliance and other candidates, urging readers to vote to prevent the alliance from gaining control. This is a clear attempt to sway public opinion and increase votes for candidates outside the mentioned alliance.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. While it presents some numerical data, it lacks objectivity and is clearly biased towards a particular outcome. The emotional language, appeals to fear ("Nu lăsați pe nimeni să vă fure speranța!"), and the explicit call to action ("ieșiți la vot") all point to a clear intention to influence the vote, rather than simply inform.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not a simple expression of personal opinion. While it presents some opinions, it uses these opinions to directly advocate for a specific electoral outcome. The numerical data and the call to action are not merely expressions of personal belief but rather strategic attempts to influence the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1130310645194385</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers indirectly to parliamentary candidates (by mentioning the PSD-PNL-USR alliance), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook post, has a clear electoral objective (influencing voters to vote against the mentioned alliance), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting by using emotional appeals and a direct call to action.  The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing, close to election day, also increases the likelihood of it being considered electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>USR</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Pop Sebastian Tiberiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Pop Sebastian Tiberiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook cu ID-ul 1130310645194385 după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care conține propagandă electorală prin prezentarea unor date numerice tendențioase pentru a influența votul împotriva alianței PSD-PNL-USR,  având ca efect electoral manipularea opiniei publice și îndemnul direct la vot împotriva acestei alianțe, fapt ce contravine prevederilor legale privind interzicerea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Postarea, care include un număr CMF,  prezintă un apel emoțional și o îndemnare explicită la vot, depășind limitele jurnalismului obiectiv și având ca scop influențarea votului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
